name: CandidaAurisInfectionTestsForCandidaAurisByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Candida auris Infection (Tests for Candida auris by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Candida auris),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Candida auris culture or isolate

LOINC search: ‘’candida auris (culture OR isolate)"),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
